name: Malevolence of the Millennium Ring (Skill Card)
skill_activation: At the start of the Duel, flip this card over.
skill_effect:
Once per turn, if you control a Fiend monster, you can activate 1 of these Skills (but you can only use each of these Skills once per Duel):
● Send 1 Fiend monster from your Deck to the GY, then lose LP equal to its original Level x 200.
● Discard 1 Fiend monster, lose LP equal to its original Level x 200, then draw 1 card.
